itunes:title: Episode 816 - Hungover At The Kentucky Derby
title: Episode 816 - Hungover At The Kentucky Derby
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway recap their booze-soaked weekend at the Kentucky Derby, including meeting Papa John outside Churchill Downs, Dan being the best-dressed person at the Derby, Ross and Jessie both winning thousands of dollars on the big race...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway recap their booze-soaked weekend at the Kentucky Derby, including meeting Papa John outside Churchill Downs, Dan being the best-dressed person at the Derby, Ross and Jessie both winning thousands of dollars on the big race, a Bob Baffert horse winning again, and just how insane and incredible of an event the Kentucky Derby really is.
